verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden צֹ֑ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre הֵילִ֣ילוּ ׀ <S%H3213><s%> Howl אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> ye ships תַּרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדַּ֤ד <S%H7703><s%> for it is laid waste מִבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> so that there is no house מִבּ֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> no entering in מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land כִּתִּ֖ים <S%H3794><s%> of Chittim נִגְלָה־ <S%H1540><s%> it is revealed לָֽמוֹ׃

דֹּ֖מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> Be still יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> ye inhabitants אִ֑י <S%H339><s%> of the isle סֹחֵ֥ר <S%H5503><s%> thou whom the merchants צִיד֛וֹן <S%H6721><s%> of Zidon עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> that pass over יָ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea מִלְאֽוּךְ׃ <S%H4390><s%> have replenished

וּבְמַ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> And by great זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> the seed שִׁחֹ֔ר <S%H7883><s%> of Sihor קְצִ֥יר <S%H7105><s%> the harvest יְא֖וֹר <S%H2975><s%> of the river תְּבֽוּאָתָ֑הּ <S%H8393><s%> [is] her revenue וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> is a סְחַ֥ר <S%H5505><s%> and she is a mart גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of nations

בּ֣וֹשִׁי <S%H954><s%> Be thou ashamed צִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> O Zidon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> hath spoken יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> for the sea מָע֥וֹז <S%H4581><s%> [even] the strength הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have neither חַ֣לְתִּי <S%H2342><s%> I travail וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָלַ֗דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> not nor bring forth children וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have neither גִדַּ֛לְתִּי <S%H1431><s%> neither do I nourish up בַּחוּרִ֖ים <S%H970><s%> young men רוֹמַ֥מְתִּי <S%H7311><s%> [nor] bring up בְתוּלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1330><s%> virgins

כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שֵׁ֖מַע <S%H8088><s%> As at the report לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> concerning Egypt יָחִ֖ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> [so] shall they be sorely pained כְּשֵׁ֥מַע <S%H8088><s%> at the report צֹֽר׃ <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre
עִבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> Pass ye over תַּרְשִׁ֑ישָׁה <S%H8659><s%> to Tarshish הֵילִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> howl יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> ye inhabitants אִֽי׃ <S%H339><s%> of the isle

הֲזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָכֶ֖ם עַלִּיזָ֑ה <S%H5947><s%> [Is] this your joyous מִֽימֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> age קֶ֤דֶם <S%H6924><s%> [is] of ancient קַדְמָתָהּ֙ <S%H6927><s%> [city] whose antiquity יֹבִל֣וּהָ <S%H2986><s%> shall carry רַגְלֶ֔יהָ <S%H7272><s%> feet מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> her afar off לָגֽוּר׃ <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn

מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> Who יָעַ֣ץ <S%H3289><s%> Who hath taken this counsel זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against צֹ֖ר <S%H6865><s%> against Tyre הַמַּֽעֲטִירָ֑ה <S%H5849><s%> the crowning אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Whose סֹחֲרֶ֙יה֙ <S%H5503><s%> [city] whose merchants שָׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> [are] princes כִּנְעָנֶ֖יהָ <S%H3669><s%> Canaanite נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <S%H3513><s%> [are] the honourable אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> common

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יְעָצָ֑הּ <S%H3289><s%> hath purposed לְחַלֵּל֙ <S%H2490><s%> it to stain גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> the pride כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all צְבִ֔י <S%H6643><s%> of all glory לְהָקֵ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> [and] to bring into contempt כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <S%H3513><s%> all the honourable אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

עִבְרִ֥י <S%H5674><s%> Pass אַרְצֵ֖ךְ <S%H776><s%> through thy land כַּיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> as a river בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter תַּרְשִׁ֕ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> There מֵ֥זַח <S%H4206><s%> [there is] no more strength עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> more

יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand נָטָ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> He stretched out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> over the sea הִרְגִּ֖יז <S%H7264><s%> he shook מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <S%H4467><s%> the kingdoms יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> hath given a commandment אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> against the merchant לַשְׁמִ֖ד <S%H8045><s%> [city] to destroy מָעֻזְנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H4581><s%> the strong

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תוֹסִ֥יפִי <S%H3254><s%> Thou shalt no more ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> You לַעְל֑וֹז <S%H5937><s%> rejoice הַֽמְעֻשָּׁקָ֞ה <S%H6231><s%> O thou oppressed בְּתוּלַ֣ת <S%H1330><s%> virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter צִיד֗וֹן <S%H6721><s%> of Zidon [כִּתִּיִּים כ] (כִּתִּים֙ <S%H3794><s%> Chittim ק) ק֣וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> arise עֲבֹ֔רִי <S%H5674><s%> pass over גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָנ֥וּחַֽ <S%H5117><s%> there also shalt thou have no rest לָֽךְ׃

הֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Behold the land כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> he הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> this people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> was not אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> was not [till] the Assyrian יְסָדָ֣הּ <S%H3245><s%> founded לְצִיִּ֑ים <S%H6728><s%> it for them that dwell in the wilderness הֵקִ֣ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> they set up [בְחִינָיו כ] (בַחוּנָ֗יו <S%H971><s%> tower ק) עֹרְרוּ֙ <S%H6209><s%> thereof they raised up אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H759><s%> the palaces שָׂמָ֖הּ <S%H7760><s%> thereof [and] he brought לְמַפֵּלָֽה׃ <S%H4654><s%> it to ruin

הֵילִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> Howl אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> ye ships תַּרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <S%H7703><s%> is laid waste מָעֻזְּכֶֽן׃ <S%H4581><s%> for your strength ס

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will happen בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְנִשְׁכַּ֤חַת <S%H7911><s%> shall be forgotten צֹר֙ <S%H6865><s%> that Tyre שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years כִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> according to the days מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> of one מִקֵּ֞ץ <S%H7093><s%> after the end שִׁבְעִ֤ים <S%H7657><s%> of seventy שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will happen לְצֹ֔ר <S%H6865><s%> shall Tyre כְּשִׁירַ֖ת <S%H7892><s%> sing הַזּוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H2181><s%> as an harlot

קְחִ֥י <S%H3947><s%> Take כִנּ֛וֹר <S%H3658><s%> an harp סֹ֥בִּי <S%H5437><s%> go about עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city זוֹנָ֣ה <S%H2181><s%> thou harlot נִשְׁכָּחָ֑ה <S%H7911><s%> that hast been forgotten הֵיטִ֤יבִי <S%H3190><s%> make sweet נַגֵּן֙ <S%H5059><s%> melody הַרְבִּי־ <S%H7235><s%> sing many שִׁ֔יר <S%H7892><s%> songs לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּזָּכֵֽרִי׃ <S%H2142><s%> that thou mayest be remembered

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> will come מִקֵּ֣ץ ׀ <S%H7093><s%> And it shall come to pass after the end שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> of seventy שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> years יִפְקֹ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> will visit יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֔ר <S%H6865><s%> Tyre וְשָׁבָ֖ה <S%H7725><s%> and she shall turn לְאֶתְנַנָּ֑ה <S%H868><s%> to her hire וְזָֽנְתָ֛ה <S%H2181><s%> and shall commit fornication אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> with all the kingdoms הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the world עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> will become סַחְרָ֜הּ <S%H5504><s%> And her merchandise וְאֶתְנַנָּ֗הּ <S%H868><s%> and her hire קֹ֚דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> shall be holiness לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵֽאָצֵ֖ר <S%H686><s%> it shall not be treasured וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יֵֽחָסֵ֑ן <S%H2630><s%> nor laid up כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לַיֹּשְׁבִ֞ים <S%H3427><s%> shall be for them that dwell לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become סַחְרָ֔הּ <S%H5504><s%> for her merchandise לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> to eat לְשָׂבְעָ֖ה <S%H7654><s%> sufficiently וְלִמְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H4374><s%> clothing עָתִֽיק׃ <S%H6266><s%> and for durable פ
